jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Overview: 

As one of Gojek's product pillar, GoLife is the largest integrated lifestyle provider in Indonesia, providing beauty, cleaning, massage, automobile, as well as daily lifestyle services through our verticals i.e. GoGlam, GoClean, GoMassage, GoAuto, GoDaily, GoLaundry, & GoFix. We launched our own app in February 2017 and it has been growing rapidly well with over 1.5 million downloads up until now.
jobsJson.description:
Overview:

As one of Gojek's product pillar, GoLife is the largest integrated lifestyle provider in Indonesia, providing beauty, cleaning, massage, automobile, as well as daily lifestyle services through our verticals i.e. GoGlam, GoClean, GoMassage, GoAuto, GoDaily, GoLaundry, & GoFix. We launched our own app in February 2017 and it has been growing rapidly well with over 1.5 million downloads up until now.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases
  • Estimate, prioritize, plan, and coordinate testing activities
  • Design, develop, and execute automation scripts using open source tools
  • Identify, record, document thoroughly and track bugs
  • Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved

• Must-Have :
  • 3+ years of experience in automation testing of software applications
  • Experience with Open Source testing tools like Appium, Rest Assured, Selenium, Cucumber, etc
  • Strong command of programming language like Java, C#, etc
  • Ability to write custom code to test applications
  • Deep understanding and ability to implement OO Programming
  • Demonstrable thinking and expertise with testing methods, strategies, and tools

    • Desired :
  • Experience of creating test frameworks and strategy
  • Ability to spike and choose appropriate automated testing tools for given problem statement
  • Exposure to version management tools like SVN and GIT
  • Familiarity with automated deployment processes (CI/CD)
  • Knowledge of Scripting Languages, like JavaScript, Python, Ruby, etc
  • Strong analytical and planning skills
